source:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_00<tab>Jihli Aliapoh would enlist your assistance in fulfilling the next stage of the prophecy.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_00<tab>* <var 1A 02 /var>Cette quête est un événement à durée limitée.<var 1A 01 /var>

Jihli Aliapoh a très envie de vous parler de la chasse aux Prœufs.

source:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_01<tab>The auspicious spriggan from Jihli's dream has finally made its appearance, and Jihli would relate to you the continuance of the prophecy. In her vision, she saw the spriggan depart Gridania, and reappear amid the dusty lanes of Ul'dah. Jihli bids you follow him there, and speak with Nonotta, her faithful assistant based near the Ruby Road Exchange, to learn of the latest developments.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_01<tab>Cette quête ne peut être commencée et effectuée que pendant la durée de l'événement saisonnier correspondant. Pour plus de détails, veuillez consulter The Lodestone.

Jihli Aliapoh souhaiterait que vous partiez à Ul'dah pour retrouver le spriggan porte-bonheur qu'elle a vu en rêve et que vous participiez à la chasse aux Prœufs. Adressez-vous à Nonotta, près des marchés de l'allée du Rubis.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_02<tab>Nonotta confirms that the auspicious spriggan has made its entrance to Ul'dah, but to the Dreamer's alarm, the spriggan did not come alone: villainous roughnecks calling themselves the “Shellshockers” have also made their way into the city, and are hunting the creature down to who knows what nefarious end. She bids you aid in the spriggan's escape, recommending you first have the local sylphic sorceress disguise you in spriggan form, to avoid attracting the brigands' unwelcome attentions.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_02<tab>Nonotta vous a demandé d'aider le spriggan porte-bonheur à prendre ses jambes à son cou. Elle vous a recommandé d'aller voir l'enchanteresse pour que celle-ci vous permette de changer d'apparence. C'est la seule solution pour ne pas vous faire repérer ni effrayer le spriggan.

source:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_03<tab>The sylphic sorceress gladly transfigures you, and presents you with a clouding scalebomb to aid in the auspicious spriggan's escape. Search the streets around the Quicksand, the spriggan's last known location, and if you should come across a Shellshocker, present him with the diverting gift.

※If the transfiguration should fade, speak with the sylphic sorceress again to be changed back into spriggan form.
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_03<tab>L'enchanteresse a utilisé son sort d'illusion. Il ne vous reste plus qu'à foncer aux Sables mouvants aussi vite que vos petites pattes vous le permettent pour donner une bonne leçon aux Toques-Prœufs. N'oubliez surtout pas de leur donner <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8A9C0202 /var><var 1D /var>!

Revenez vous adresser à l'enchanteresse si vous reprenez mal<var 16 /var>en<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>treu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment forme humaine.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_04<tab>You find the spriggan cornered by a pair of infamous Shellshockers, and despite the leader's grumblings, you press your present into his hands. In the ensuing chaos, the spriggan bolts from their clutches. Return to the Ruby Road Exchange to report your successful rescue effort to Nonotta.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez sauvé le spriggan porte-bonheur. Allez annoncer la nouvelle à Nonotta. Elle se trouve toujours à proximité des marchés de l'allée du Rubis.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_05<tab>Nonotta is glad to hear of the auspicious spriggan's escape, but fears the Shellshockers will not cease their wicked hunt until the creature has fled the confines of the city. She bids you transform into spriggan form once more, so that you might aid the auspicious spriggan's flight without attracting the ruffians' ire.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_05<tab>La petite Lalafelle pense que les brigands n'ont pas abandonné l'idée de goûter au spriggan. Elle pense qu'ils comptent sur leurs congénères pour terminer le travail. Allez vite voir l'enchanteresse pour qu'elle utilise à nouveau son sort d'illusion sur vous.

source:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_06<tab>The sylphic sorceress magicks you into furry form, and hands you another clouding scalebomb to distract the evil Shellshockers. The auspicious spriggan was seen racing towards the Gate of the Sultana, but chances are the bandits have got there first. Head to the gate, and ensure the auspicious spriggan evades their greedy clutches.

※If the transfiguration should fade, speak with the sylphic sorceress again to be changed back into spriggan form.
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_06<tab>L'enchanteresse vous a changé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> en spriggan. Vous devez maintenant aller à la porte de Nanamo et donner <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8A9C0202 /var> aux Toques-Prœufs. Il n'y a que comme ça qu'ils laisseront le pauvre petit monstre tranquille.

Revenez vous adresser à l'enchanteresse si vous reprenez mal<var 16 /var>en<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>treu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment forme humaine.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_07<tab>You find the auspicious spriggan cornered once again, this time by a trio of salivating Shellshockers. Their leader waves you away, but your insistence pays off─he agrees to accept the booby-trapped gift. With his would-be captors incapacitated by a fit of coughing, the spriggan makes a break for the gates, and flees into the wide blue yonder. Return to Nonotta, and inform her of the spriggan's safe escape.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_07<tab>Grâce à vous, le spriggan a réussi à s'enfuir et a quitté Ul'dah. Nonotta sera ravie de le savoir en sécurité. Allez le lui annoncer, elle se trouve toujours à côté des marchés près de l'allée du Rubis.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_08<tab>Nonotta is relieved to hear of the spriggan's escape, and rejoices in the fact that all is proceeding as Jihli's vision predicted. But just as she is about to explain the next stage of the prophecy, a Shellshocker approaches, and speaks to her with suspicious familiarity. Nonotta tries to gloss over the unusual exchange, but the air remains heavy with lingering doubt: could the day's commotions have all been a ruse, orchestrated by Nonotta herself? And if so, to what end...?
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SEQ_08<tab>Vous avez raconté vos aventures à Nonotta et sa joie vous a paru sincère... jusqu'à ce que l'un des Toques-Prœufs lui parle comme à une amie proche. Nonotta ne s'est cependant pas démontée et elle compte visiblement vous donner une autre mission. Mais comment ne pas douter<var 1D /var>? Et si tout ceci n'était qu'une vaste supercherie, un coup monté par les rêveuses<var 1D /var>? Si vous êtes prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à lui faire confiance, retournez lui adresser la parole.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Nonotta in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Nonotta, à Ul'dah

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the sylphic sorceress in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_TODO_01<tab>Parler à l'enchanteresse

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_TODO_02<tab>While transfigured, give the clouding scalebomb to the Shellshocker.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_TODO_02<tab>Se transformer et donner <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8A9C0202 /var> aux Toques-Prœufs

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_000<tab>Are you ready to fulfill the next step of the prophecy, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? In my vision, the auspicious spriggan first appeared amid verdant woodland, but soon the light grew brighter, the air warmer and scented with rich perfumes. The ground beneath his feet was no longer leaves, but stone and sand.
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_000<tab>C'est la grande fête des œufs<var 1D /var>! Noirs, blancs, jaunes ou bleus...
Tout le monde se prend au jeu de la chasse aux Prœufs.♪
Maintenant que le spriggan porrrte-bonheur s'est montré, il va falloir faire comme dans mon rêve et partir à sa poursuite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_001<tab>There is but one explanation: the spriggan shall leave the tranquility of Gridania, and reappear amid the hustle and bustle of Ul'dah! Follow him there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─if the creature is to guide us to the wondrous treasure that the Archons spoke of, he must not escape our sight!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_001<tab>Dans ma vision, il apparaissait d'abord à Grrridania avant de s'enfuir et d'être aperçu par la suite à Ul'dah.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_002<tab>What is more, the prophecy held black tidings of a hidden threat lurking in the desert... I know not at whose hands, but I fear the auspicious spriggan may be in danger. So I turn to you, my friend: you found the spriggan once, and I have full faith you shall do so again.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_002<tab>En fait, il était à chaque fois victime de troubles dans chacune des trrrois cités éorzéennes. Mais comme je vous l'ai dit, il finissait par nous guider vers un trésor inestimable.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_003<tab>Go to Ul'dah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and meet with my good friend Nonotta by the Ruby Road Exchange. She is leading the revelries in the city, and will be the first to hear if the spriggan has been sighted. Good luck, and may the Archons of yore bless you and keep you.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_003<tab>Vu qu'en <var 08 E905 ((bonne grosse chanceuse)) ((bon gros chanceux)) /var> que tu es, tu as déjà croisé sa route une fois, j'aimerais que tu partes pour Ul'dah et que tu participes aux festivités là-bas. Nonotta te donnera plus d'in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions à ce sujet. Elle se trouve au nord des marrrchés de l'allée du Rubis.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_010<tab>It was the will of the Archons that you should discover the auspicious spriggan, and surely your destiny to follow in its footsteps. Pray journey to the Ruby Road Exchange in Ul'dah, and speak with Nonotta. She is leading the revelries in the city, and should be best informed as to the current situation.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_JIHLIALIAPOH_000_010<tab>Maintenant que tu as participé aux événements gridaniens, ce serait bien que tu participes aux festivités uldiennes, au nord des marrrchés de l'allée du Rubis. Ne t'inquiète pas, Nonotta sera là pour répondre à toutes tes questions<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_030<tab>Greetings, friend. I wish you happiest of Hatching<var 1F /var>tides. ...You say that Jihli sent you to join the hunt? Then you are most welcome─any friend of Jihli's is a friend of mine.
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_030<tab>Un petit œuf, deux petits œufs, trois petits œufs, quatre...♪
Oh, c'est Jihli qui t'envoie pour te lancer dans la chasse aux Prœufs<var 1D /var>? Génial<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_031<tab>But this is no time to be gallivanting around hunting for eggs, my dear─the auspicious spriggan is in terrible trouble! We must hasten to his rescue, lest the prophecy be torn to tatters, and the wondrous treasure lost for all eternity!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_031<tab>Mais c'est pas vraiment le moment, là. Il paraît que le spriggan porte-bonheur a de trèèès gros problèmes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_032<tab>Did Jihli mention the auspicious spriggan to you? The creature appeared to her in a prophetic vision─she saw it travel across Eorzea with a band of revelers in its wake, leading them to a great reward. First she saw it in Gridania, then it moved to Ul'dah...and as sure as eggs is eggs, here it moved!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_032<tab>Tu te demandes de quoi je peux bien parler, hein<var 1D /var>? Si tu veux tout savoir, la petite créature est ef<var 16 /var>fec<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment apparue à Ul'dah, comme dans le rêve de Jihli...

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_033<tab>However, there was another element to her vision─a lurking menace, hidden in the sands─and sure enough, the very same has come to pass! A band of ruffians have made ingress to the city, and are hunting down the spriggan to Thal knows what sinister end.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_033<tab>Mais malheureusement, des hommes par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement louches sont arrivés d'on ne sait où et se sont lancés à sa poursuite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_034<tab>They call themselves the Shellshockers... A name that inspires revulsion in any enthusiast of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, wouldn't you agree? There can be no doubt that it is they who are the malignant force from Jihli's vision.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_034<tab>Ils se faisaient appeler les “Toques-Prœufs” et crois-moi, ils n'inspiraient vraiment pas confiance.

source:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_035<tab>I beg you: track these villains down, and save the auspicious spriggan from their evil clutches! Oh, and do be sure to go in disguise. Believe you me, these men are dangerous, and it would not do for them to recognize the face of one who would deny them their quarry.
Luck has it that a number of sylphic sorceresses are assisting us with the festivities. Pray speak to the one just across the road from here─she will transfigure you into spriggan form. Good luck, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and may the Archons of yore bless you and keep you.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_035<tab>Je t'en prie, va secourir notre petite créature porte-bonheur<var 1D /var>! Enfin, attends une seconde. Si tu pars sous ta forme humaine, le spriggan prendra peur. Va voir l'enchanteresse de l'autre côté de la rue pour qu'elle s'occupe de toi.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_040<tab>If the prophecy is to be fulfilled, those awful men must not be allowed to get their hands on the auspicious spriggan. However, it would be little better if they were to seize you in its place. Pray speak with our sylphic assistant, and have her grant you a furry disguise. Godsspeed, my friend!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_040<tab>S'il te plaît, aide le spriggan porte-bonheur<var 1D /var>! Mais ne pars pas sous ta forme humaine, sinon tu vas faire peur au spriggan. Passe voir l'enchanteresse de l'autre côté de la rue et elle te jettera son sort d'illusion.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_060<tab>Walking one wants to protect lucky one from shocking ones? This one wants to help lucky one too! This one will use tricky tricks to turn walking one into a furry one, then shocking ones won't know what hit shocking ones!
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_060<tab>Noirs, blancs, jaunes et bleus...
Tout le monde se prend au jeu de la chasse aux Prœufs.♪
Je veux bien utiliser mon sort d'illusion sur toi,
mais sauve le spriggan porte-bonheur, promets-le-moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_061<tab>This one heard other adventuring ones saying that the lucky one has been seen outside the Quicksand. Walking one should go there, and tell lucky one to run, run away!
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_061<tab>Un aventurier nous a dit avoir croisé la petite boule de poils noir de jais.
C'était devant Les Sables mouvants, à côté. Dépêche-toi, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_062<tab>This one just hopes shocking ones don't get there first. If walking one does happen to bump into the shocking ones, this one has a little present. It's sure to make shocking ones' Hatching<var 1F /var>tide go with a bang!
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_062<tab>Si les Toques-Prœufs trouvent le spriggan avant toi,
ne recule pas, ne te décourage pas<var 1D /var>!
Donne-leur cet <var 33 ((EventItem)) 0DF61E8A9C0202 /var>
et laisse-le s'occuper de ces sans-gêne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_063<tab>These ones like playing tricks, and this is a new one: a scalebomb filled with a provocative powder that makes any who breathe it cough and wheeze. This one painted it to look like a Hatching<var 1F /var>tide egg─shocking ones will think it's a pretty present, but shocking ones will get a shocking surprise!
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_063<tab>Cette bombe camouflée en Prœuf diffusera une épaisse fumée.
Lorsqu'ils l'ouvriront, croyant à ta générosité,
elle surprendra ces hommes et les fera tousser.
Notre problème sera réglé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_070<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, is that really you? My word, those sylphic magicks are convincing─those dastardly Shellshockers will never recognize you now. Quickly, my friend: find the auspicious spriggan, and help it escape from their evil clutches!
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_070<tab>C'est la grande fête des œufs<var 1D /var>! Noirs, blancs, jaunes ou bleus...♪
Je vois que tu t'es changé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> en spriggan. C'est parfait, tu vas pouvoir aller secourir notre petite mascotte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_075<tab>Lucky one has been seen along Emerald Avenue, but if this one has heard that, shocking ones will surely have heard it too. If walking one bumps into shocking ones, don't forget to give the shocking ones the special surprise!
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_075<tab>Donne aux Toques-Prœufs <var 33 ((EventItem)) 07F61E8A9C0202 /var>,
si tu assistes à une scène malsaine.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_080<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, your disguise has faded! You mustn't confront those ruffians as you are, or they shall surely revenge themselves on you. Speak with the sylphic sorceress across the road, and she'll soon have you hidden in the shape of a spriggan.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_080<tab>Je vois que le sort d'illusion s'est dissipé. Retourne voir l'enchanteresse pour qu'elle te transforme en spriggan et tu pourras reprendre ta mission.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_085<tab>What happened, walking one? Did this one's skin<var 1F /var>changing trick fade away? Never fear─this one will make walking one furry again!
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_085<tab>Les effets du sort d'illusion se sont dissipés<var 1D /var>?
Donne-moi une seconde et tu pourras y retourner.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00556_000_090<tab>Eat Spriggy egg! Tasty egg! Don't eat Spriggyyy! No, no, noooooo!!!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00556_000_090<tab>Aide, aide<var 1D /var>! Les méchants veulent manger. Pas miam miam, le spriggan aux Prœuuufs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERA00557_000_095<tab>What d'you think <var 1A 02 /var>you're<var 1A 01 /var> looking at? Me and my mate are having a little get-together with our old friend Spriggy here, and you ain't invited. Get yourself gone, before I get you gone.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERA00557_000_095<tab>On se connaît<var 1D /var>? Tu vois pas qu'on discute avec le morceau de charbon poilu<var 1D /var>? Dégage<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERA00557_000_110<tab>Thal's balls, it's another one! Hold on, no it ain't─just another one of them adventurers playing dress-up. Gives me the creeps, it does. ...You want to give me a Hatching<var 1F /var>tide present? Get away, <var 08 E905 ((girl)) ((lad)) /var>, can't you see we're busy with something here?
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERA00557_000_110<tab>T'es pas un vrai spriggan, toi<var 1D /var>! T'es venu me donner un Prœuf<var 1D /var>? C'est gentil, mais je suis occupé, là...

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERA00557_000_111<tab>Busy with what? Heh heh. You see this furry feller we've got here─he's the famous auspicious spriggan everyone's been going on about. And d'you know what we're going to do? We're going to boil him up, and suck the flesh from his bones! Then <var 1A 02 /var>we'll<var 1A 01 /var> be the ones with all the luck!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERA00557_000_111<tab>Tu te demandes ce que je fabrique<var 1D /var>? Il paraît que ce spriggan n'est pas comme les autres. Celui-ci, il porte bonheur<var 1D /var>! Du coup, on s'est dit qu'on allait le faire cuire et le manger. Ça nous portera peut-être chance<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERA00557_000_112<tab>Thal almighty, are you still going on about that present? Alright, alright! I'll take your bloody egg, if that's what it takes to get rid of you. Hand it over, then sling your hook!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERA00557_000_112<tab>C'est bon, j'ai compris. Tu veux que je prenne ton œuf... C'est d'accord, mais tu dégages après<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERA00557_000_113<tab>Aaagh! What the─? I-I can't breathe! <cough> <cough> <cough>
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERA00557_000_113<tab>Ouaaah<var 1D /var>! C'était quoi cette explosion<var 1D /var>? (tousse)

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00556_000_114<tab>Lucky Spriggy! Lucky, lucky! Run awaaaaaay!!!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00556_000_114<tab>Ouste, ouste<var 1D /var>? Ouuuste<var 1D /var>!!!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERB00557_000_115<tab><cough> <gasp> Buggeration! The spriggan's made a run for it!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERB00557_000_115<tab>Il s'est fait la malle<var 1D /var>! Il faut qu'on le rattrape<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERA00557_000_116<tab>He won't get far! <cough> <cough> We'll get onto the fellers and tell them to cut him off. Did you see which way the bastard went? <cough>
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERA00557_000_116<tab>Préviens nos collègues pour qu'ils le prennent à revers. Raaah, où est-ce qu'il va comme ça, on va le perdre de vue... Vite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_0120<tab>Walking one! This one just saw lucky one run past, with lucky one's little legs going like the clappers. Did this one's clouding scalebomb come in handy? Is lucky one safe now? Ah, but don't tell this one─little dreaming one will want to find out first!
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_0120<tab>C'est un plaisir de savoir que <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8A9C0202 /var> a marché,
et que ces vauriens n'ont pas eu d'autre choix que de filer.
Nous savons tou<var 08 E905 ((tes)) ((s)) /var> les deux qui sera comblée<var 1D /var>:
Nonotta, notre petite Lalafelle toujours plus enjouée<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_130<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, is that you? I just saw the auspicious spriggan run past, and it seemed like he was in a hurry! Is he saved from the Shellshockers? Are the ruffians defeated? Is the prophecy─ Oh, but forgive my impatience. Allow me to get you out of that disguise, and then you can tell me all.
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_130<tab>C'est la grande fête des œufs<var 1D /var>! Noirs, blancs, jaunes ou bleus...♪
Bien joué<var 1D /var>! Laisse-moi annuler les effets du sort d'illusion, que je voie ton visage...

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_140<tab>There you are, my friend! Pray tell me all that has occurred. Were you able to rescue the lucky spriggan from the Shellshockers' cruel intentions?
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_140<tab>Alors, ça s'est passé comment<var 1D /var>? Le spriggan a réussi à s'enfuir<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_141<tab>It exploded right in their faces? Ha ha! They shan't be messing with spriggans again any time soon! Though it puzzles me what a band of roughnecks like them would want with a spriggan in the first place. By any chance did they mention what their <var 1A 02 /var>cruel intentions<var 1A 01 /var> actually were?
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_141<tab>Merci du fond du cœur<var 1D /var>! Enfin, on ne sait toujours pas ce que ces vauriens voulaient faire de cette pauvre petite bête... Le mystère reste entier.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_142<tab>Whaaat!? They plan to boil up its body and sup on its flesh? I would have thought a spriggan lends itself more to a spit roa─ ...I mean, that's the most awful thing I've ever heard!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_142<tab>Ils voulaient la faire mijoter<var 1D /var>!? Ça doit être délici... euh, c'est absolument délictueux<var 1D /var>! Enfin, sans doute... quelque part en Éorzéa.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_143<tab>Word on the street has it that these dastardly Shellshockers are actually a band of notorious treasure hunters, with a reputation as bad as their fortunes. ...So that's their game, is it? The dolts think that if they eat the auspicious spriggan, they'll absorb his luck through their gullets.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_143<tab>Bref, je me suis renseignée au sujet de ces Toques-Prœufs et il paraît que c'est un groupe de chasseurs de trésors qui s'est illustré par ses différents méfaits. Il ne fait aucun doute qu'ils aimeraient bénéficier de la chance que ce spriggan pourrait leur apporter...

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_144<tab>If that's the case, they won't be put off by a little coughing and sneezing. Only when the auspicious spriggan has safely escaped the city can we rest at ease. It's just as Jihli predicted it─a double danger emerging from the deserts. The spriggan must need our aid once more!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_144<tab>Mais tu sais quoi<var 1D /var>? Dans la vision de Jihli, le spriggan se trouvait à deux reprises dans une situation par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement critique à Ul'dah.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_145<tab>He flew straight past here, towards the Gate of the Sultana, but no doubt the brigands have it blockaded. We mustn't allow the Shellshockers to catch him, or you, for that matter─you had best go in disguise again. My sylphic assistant might have another of her <var 1A 02 /var>presents<var 1A 01 /var> for you, too!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_145<tab>Si son rêve était prémonitoire, ça veut dire qu'il va à nouveau falloir lui venir en aide. Ça te dérangerait de demander à l'enchanteresse de jeter encore une fois son sort d'illusion sur toi<var 1D /var>? Si Jihli a vu juste, le spriggan porte-bonheur devrait se trouver à la porte de Nanamo.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_150<tab>Quickly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─the auspicious spriggan needs your aid! Ask the sorceress to disguise you, and race to the Gate of the Sultana as fast as you can. No doubt those thick-witted ruffians have laid an ambush for the poor, frightened soul.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_150<tab>L'enchanteresse est prête à te changer en spriggan dès que tu souhaiteras aller à la porte de Nanamo pour secourir notre spriggan préféré.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_160<tab>Walking one wants to turn into furry one again? Never fear, this one has plenty of skin-changing magick left. This one saw lucky one running towards the Gate of the Sultana─does walking one think shocking ones will be lying in wait?
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_160<tab>Tu es prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à aller à la porte de Nanamo<var 1D /var>?
Pas de problème, je vais te transformer à nouveau<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_161<tab>If walking one sees shocking ones, this one has another tricky present for walking one to hand over! Shocking ones might be shocking, but shocking ones aren't the sharpest blades in the box. Maybe shocking ones will fall for the same wheeze twice!
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_161<tab>J'ai aussi <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A9C0202 /var> à te donner.
Tu n'auras qu'à l'utiliser si le spriggan est en danger<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_170<tab>That's it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─a perfect disguise! Now head to the Gate of the Sultana, as quick as you can. We might have no longer than the time it takes to boil a cauldron before Jihli's dream meets with a rude awakening!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_170<tab>Maintenant que tu es méconnaissable, dépêche-toi d'aller à la porte de Nanamo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_175<tab>This one uses magicks to turn walking ones into furry ones. Walking one can use tricky egg to turn shocking ones into wheezy ones! Go to the Gate of the Sultana, and help lucky one escape!
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_175<tab>Si tu croises ces fichus Toques-Prœufs à la porte de Nanamo,
donne-leur <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8A9C0202 /var>, et ils tousseront prestissimo...

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00556_000_190<tab>Spriggy trapped! Traaaaaapped! Don't eat Spriggy! Taste baaaaaad!!!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00556_000_190<tab>Au secours, au secouuurs<var 1D /var>! Le spriggan, c'est pas miam-miam<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_195<tab>There ain't nothing to see here, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Go fry an egg. ...And put a pan of water on while you're at it, ha ha!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_195<tab>Tu veux ma photo<var 1D /var>? On a enfin mis la main sur ce qu'on cherchait, alors j'espère que t'es pas un<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de ces <var 08 E905 ((empêcheuses)) ((empêcheurs)) /var> de tourner en rond<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_200<tab>You got business with me, adventurer? Well, my blade's got business with this here spriggan. Maybe once we're finished with him, we can get round to you.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_200<tab>Qu'est-ce que tu me veux<var 1D /var>? Tu vois pas que je discute avec la petite bête, là<var 1D /var>? Vous êtes amis, c'est ça<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERD00557_000_201<tab>What's the holdup, chief? Let's just grab the bugger and cook him up before he skips out on us again!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERD00557_000_201<tab>On n'a pas de temps à perdre avec toi. Ton copain devrait déjà patauger dans la marmite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_202<tab>If you've got something to say, adventurer, then spit it out. ...You're handing out presents for Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, and you want me to have one? Nald on a chocobo, you won't take no for an answer, will you? Come on then─hand it over, and then piss off!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_202<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>? Tu as un truc pour moi<var 1D /var>? Bon sang, si c'est le prix à payer pour que tu nous fiches la paix... Fais-moi voir ça.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_203<tab><cough> <cough> <cough> What in the seven hells!? You'll pay for this, you─ <cough> <cough> Aaagh!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_203<tab>C'est quoi cette blague<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00556_000_204<tab>Spriggy free! Freeeeee! You Spriggy friend! Thank yoooooou!!!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00556_000_204<tab>Merci, merci<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERE00557_000_205<tab><cough> <cough> Ch-Chief! The spriggan's got away!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERE00557_000_205<tab>Chef, le spriggan est en train de s'en aller. Il quitte la ville<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_206<tab><wheeze> Gah, he's made it out of the gates! We'll never catch him now! Looks like our <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((dinner's)) ((breakfast's)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((lunch is)) ((dinner's)) /var>)) /var> off the table. Let's get the hells out of here before we <cough> <cough> <cough> up our <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((lunch)) ((guts)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((breakfast)) ((lunch)) /var>)) /var> and all!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_206<tab>Bon sang de bois, on n'arrivera pas à l'attraper aujourd'hui... Allez les gars, repli stratégique<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_220<tab>Walking one helped lucky one get away? Well done, walking one! This one is sure that little dreaming one will be very pleased to hear it!
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_FRIENDLYSYLPH00557_000_220<tab>Grâce à toi, le spriggan a pris la fuite<var 1D /var>?
Pauvre bête, qui enchaîne ces mauvaises rencontres si fortuites.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_240<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! ...That is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> beneath all that fur, isn't it? Hold on a moment, and I'll change you back to normal.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_240<tab>Mon aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> préféré<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> est de retour<var 1D /var>? Laisse-moi te rendre forme humaine<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_250<tab>It is good to see your face again, my friend. Tell me true: was the auspicious spriggan able to escape the city?
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_250<tab>Dis-moi tout<var 1D /var>! Comment va le spriggan porte-bonheur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_251<tab>Thank the gods! Or should I say thank the Archons of yore, for these events are just as they revealed them to Jihli in her dream. The spriggan appeared in the streets of Ul'dah, overcame two crises with an adventurer's aid, and escaped to pastures new!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_251<tab>Hourra<var 1D /var>! Nous avons eu beaucoup de chance qu'il soit parvenu à s'enfuir<var 1D /var>! En tout cas, la ressemblance avec la vision de Jihli est vraiment troublante. Tout colle à la perfection.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_252<tab>The adventurer in her vision can only have been you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>: the one who would follow the spriggan across the realm, leading the people to a wondrous treasure! If all is proceeding according to the prophecy, the auspicious spriggan should next show its face in─
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_252<tab>Je suis certaine que tu es <var 08 E905 ((celle)) ((celui)) /var> qui est apparu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> dans son rêve. Il n'y a que sur toi que je puisse compter pour la suite. Je vais te dire où le petit spriggan s'est pro<var 16 /var>ba<var 16 /var>ble<var 16 /var>ment réfugié.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_253<tab>(-???-)Alright, Nono. How's it going with the festival? Me and the lads have finished up for the day.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_253<tab>(-???-)Hé, Nonotta<var 1D /var>! J'ai enfin terminé ma part du boulot<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_254<tab>(-???-)It was pretty rough out there, you know. You could've warned us about those scalebombs─they don't half pack a punch! I thought I was going to cough up a lung!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_254<tab>(-???-)Ça a été plus difficile que prévu. Je sais pas si <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8A9C0202 /var> t'a déjà explosé au visage, mais ça pique un peu.

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_255<tab>...O-Oh no, it's the <var 1A 02 /var>leader of the Shellshockers<var 1A 01 /var>, the <var 1A 02 /var>evil bandits<var 1A 01 /var> who tried to ruin Hatching<var 1F /var>tide! How dare you show your face to a Dreamer <var 1A 02 /var>while she's still working<var 1A 01 /var>. Get out of my sight right now, or I'll have <var 1A 02 /var>this adventurer<var 1A 01 /var> throw you out!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_255<tab>Euuuh... Vous faites erreur sur la personne, M-monsieur<var 1D /var>! Vous ne seriez pas l'un de ces horribles Toques-Prœufs<var 1D /var>? Vous en avez du culot pour oser vous présenter devant un membre organisateur de la chasse aux Prœufs<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_256<tab>(-???-)...<var 1A 02 /var>This adventurer<var 1A 01 /var>? Don't tell me <var 1A 02 /var><var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var><var 1A 01 /var> was the one who─
target:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_256<tab>(-???-)Mais, Nonotta... Ah<var 1D /var>!!
Oups<var 1D /var>! Dis-moi, tu serais pas le genre d'aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var> qui hésiterait pas à se changer en spriggan pour te balader dans Ul'dah par le plus grand des hasards<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_257<tab>Ohhh... Erm, er...listen here, you! I know you're hiding that auspicious spriggan somewhere, and if you don't tell me where, I'll...er...boil you up, and eat you! ...What's the matter─coeurl got your tongue? Well, in that case, I'll be off. See you in Limsa Lominsa, Nono.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_EGGCRUSHERC00557_000_257<tab>Ahem<var 1D /var>! Ouais bah regarde-moi bien, parce qu'un Toque-Prœuf digne de ce nom n'a pas peur de venir narguer l'ennemi en face<var 1D /var>! Dis au revoir à ton petit spriggan adoré, parce qu'on n'en a pas fini avec lui<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_258<tab>Erm... Er... Th-The <var 1A 02 /var>nerve<var 1A 01 /var> of that brigand, acting as if he knows me─which I assure you, he most absolutely, <var 1A 02 /var>definitely<var 1A 01 /var> does not! Why, to the untrained eye, it might look as if I was somehow in cahoots with the fellow!
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_258<tab>Je te jure que je ne connais pas cet homme<var 1D /var>! Ce n'est absolument pas un ami de longue date, ni quoi que ce soit qui y ressemble<var 1D /var>! Nous ne sommes pas complices et nous n'avons jamais rien manigancé ensemble<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_259<tab>...But we have no time to be considering the motivations of complete strangers. I've got an unshakable feeling that something terrible is about to happen! We must divert all our attentions to ensuring that nothing stops the prophecy from being fulfilled!
Ready yourself, my friend─free your mind of any doubts, and return to me when you are prepared to face the next trial. Until then, may the Archons of yore bless you and keep you.
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_NONOTTA_000_259<tab>Tu dois me croire. Quelque chose de très grave est en train de se passer et si tu es prêt<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à me faire confiance, je veux bien tout te raconter...

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00557_000_090<tab>
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00557_000_090<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00557_000_114<tab>
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00557_000_114<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00557_000_190<tab>
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00557_000_190<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00557_000_204<tab>
target: TEXT_FESEST102_00557_SPRIGGAN00557_000_204<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
